name: Anxiety Disco
description:
There are too much people in the venue, lot of poeple trying to hit on you, somebody bumps into you every time while you just wanted to spend the night with your friend and cool music.  You need to stick close to your friend otherwise you'll get anxious and then...

Anxiety Disco is a puzzle game where you have to navigate two close friends through a crowded music venue. Sticking together is nice but sometimes you have to break their connection in order to advance.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

- WASD / Arrows: moving together when close to each other

- WASD to move green and Arrows to move purple when they are separated

- Enter to reset the level

You can switch levels anytime.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 in 48 hours. Everything (design, programming, graphics, audio) done by me.
